void removeTag (object sender, EventArgs e)
 This function removes the image tag from ImageSource. This is used as the postive action when confirming an image removal.
void noAction (object sender, EventArgs e)
 This function only refetches the tag list for the image. It is used as the negative action when confirming an image removal.
